content: @vertexclique I've checked the ES translation in staging and it looks good to me :tada:
I've submitted a few corrections to Pontoon (and 2 missing strings)

I noticed a couple of things though:

  • The privacy policy is not translatable, apparently? I can't see the strings in Pontoon
  • The Async Foundations working group does not show its translated version (http://www-staging.rust-lang.org/es/governance). I checked and the strings are in Pontoon

The Async Foundations working group does not show its translated version (http://www-staging.rust-lang.org/es/governance). I checked and the strings are in Pontoon

You should check the github source, if it's missing there, it's because pontoon hasn't synced yet. https://github.com/rust-lang/www.rust-lang.org/tree/master/locales/es
I just synced pontoon and it updated the spanish translation so that must have fixed it.
per your other conversation with Manish, should we move this to #t-community/l10n/es ? I'm not sure how this is supposed to work yet :thinking:
Well I think we still have to figure that out. It's also should be fine for this topic to be here until we do.
Cool. The ES translation is up to 100% again
@_rvidal And it's now live :tada:
